potions.name: Abyss Potion
potions.description: Purge all cards in your discard pile.

potions.name: Alpha Potion
potions.description: Shuffle 1 Alpha into your Draw Pile.

potions.name: Artist's Potion
potions.description: Shuffle 2 Reflex and 2 Tactician into your draw pile. At the start of your turn, discard 1 card.

potions.name: Bias Potion
potions.description: Gain 5 Focus. At the end of each turn, lose 1 Focus.

potions.name: Blink Potion
potions.description: Draw 1 card. Discard up to 3 cards. For each card discarded, gain 1 Dexterity.

potions.name: Bottle Of Vodka
potions.description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. Shuffle 3 Dazed into your draw pile.

potions.name: Bottle of Rum
potions.description: Gain 3 Strength. Lose 1 Dexterity.

potions.name: Bottled Hope
potions.description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Draw until you have 5 cards in your hand.

potions.name: Bubble Potion
potions.description: At the end of each turn, gain 5 Block. Lasts util you play 5 more cards, then wears off and gives 2 Energy.

potions.name: Coolant Vial
potions.description: Channel 2 Frost.

potions.name: Envenomed Coating
potions.description: Whenever you deal unblocked damage, inflict 5 Poison. Decreases by 1 whenever you play a card.

potions.name: Epiphany Potion
potions.description: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 1 for the remainder of this combat.

potions.name: Faithless Potion
potions.description: When you attack target enemy, gain 2 Mantra. At the end of each turn, lose 2 Mantra.

potions.name: Frostheart Potion
potions.description: Discard your hand. Gain 2 Plated Armor for each card discarded.

potions.name: Fruit Punch
potions.description: Gain 2 max HP. Deal 10 damage to target enemy.

potions.name: Horror Potion
potions.description: Every time you play 2 attacks in one turn, inflict 1 Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies. Wears off at the end of the turn if not triggered.

potions.name: Iron Compound
potions.description: Deal 10 Damage to target enemy. Gain 10 Block.

potions.name: Louse Decoction
potions.description: The next time you take unblocked damage, gain 32 Block.

potions.name: Midnight Oil
potions.description: Scry 4. Draw 1 card.

potions.name: Moonshine
potions.description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Lose 1 Strength and Dexterity.

potions.name: Ninja Potion
potions.description: Shivs do 2 more damage. After playing 7 more cards, add 3 Shivs to your hand.

potions.name: Null Potion
potions.description: Whenever you draw a status, draw 1 more cards and deal 3 damage to all enemies. At the start of your turn, shuffle 1 Void into your deck.

potions.name: Philter Of Motion
potions.description: Whenever you play a non-Skill card, gain 2 Block. Lasts until you play a Skill.

potions.name: Pressure Potion
potions.description: Apply 20 Mark. All enemies take damage equal to their Mark.

potions.name: Relay Potion
potions.description: Trigger the passive ability of your rightmost orb 4 times.

potions.name: System Wipe
potions.description: Evoke all Orbs.

potions.name: Bottled Trinity
potions.description: Add 1 Miracle, 1 Insight, and 1 Safety to your hand.

potions.name: Conflaguration Potion
potions.description: Gain 5 Strength. Shuffle 3 Burns into your draw pile.

potions.name: Consuming Void
potions.description: Lose Orbs Slots until you have 2. For each slot lost, gain 1 Energy and 1 Focus.

potions.name: Corrosion Flask
potions.description: Remove all Block from target enemy.

potions.name: Enraging Potion
potions.description: This turn, whenever you play a Skill, gain 2 Strength. At the end of each turn this combat, lose 1 Strength

potions.name: Hummingbird Potion
potions.description: Receive 50% less attack damage. Lasts until you play 5 more cards.

potions.name: Plasma Fuel
potions.description: Channel 1 Energy. Gain 1 Orb Slot.

potions.name: Polymorph Potion
potions.description: Transform all cards in your hand.

potions.name: Pyrophyllite Brew
potions.description: Whenever you play a non-Attack card, gain 2 Vigor. Lasts until you play an Attack.

potions.name: Rememory Potion
potions.description: Shuffle a copy of every card in your hand into your Draw Pile.

potions.name: Savage Potion
potions.description: Inflict 2 Weak and Vulnerable on all enemies. Gain 3 Frail.

potions.name: Smith Potion
potions.description: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 Strength

potions.name: Stoneskin Potion
potions.description: Lose 3 Dexterity. Gain 10 Plated Armor.

potions.name: Suffocating Smog
potions.description: Whenever you play a card this turn, all enemies take 3 damage.

potions.name: Tesla Potion
potions.description: Lose 2 Strength. Channel 5 Lightning.

potions.name: True Ectoplasm
potions.description: Shuffle 2 Apparition and 4 Slimed into your Draw Pile.

potions.name: Virophage
potions.description: When target enemy dies, it does damage to all enemies equal to its max HP.

potions.name: Artificer Potion
potions.description: When you play a power, gain 1 Artifact. Wears off after playing 2 powers in one turn.

potions.name: Creativity Potion
potions.description: Shuffle 3 random Powers into your Draw Pile.

potions.name: Empty Bottle
potions.description: Permanently gain 1 potion slot.

potions.name: Entrenched Potion
potions.description: Do not remove Block at the end of your next 4 turns.

potions.name: Exalted Potion
potions.description: Gain 4 Strength and 4 Dexterity. The next time you take unblocked damage, permanently gain a Pride.

potions.name: Forbidden Fruit Juice
potions.description: Heal until you are at Max HP. Lose 10 Max HP.

potions.name: Fruit Preserves
potions.description: Heal until you are at 50% of your max HP.

potions.name: Heartbeat Potion
potions.description: You can not take more than 16 damage per turn. Whenever you play a card this combat, take 1 damage.

potions.name: Impenetrable Potion
potions.description: Gain 1 Metalicize, 1 Plated Armor, 1 Artifct, 1 Dexterity, 1 Buffer, 1 Thorns, and 1 Blur.

potions.name: Limitless Potion
potions.description: Multiply your Strength by 2.

potions.name: Recall Potion
potions.description: Select 2 cards from your discard and add them to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Bluelaboratory:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

mods.name: The Blue Laboratory
mods.description: Adds 45 new potions into the game
